00005 sub addVariables {
00006   my $context = shift; my @vars;
00007   foreach my $v ('a'..'z','A'..'Z') {push(@vars,$v=>'Real')}
00008   $context->variables->are(@vars);
00009   $context->variables->remove('U'); # used as operator below
00010 }

00129 package Typeset::Function::Fence;
00130 @ISA = qw(Typeset::Function);
00131 
00132 sub _check {
00133   my $self = shift; my $n = scalar(@{$self->{params}});
00134   $self->Error("Fence requires an open parenthesis, a formula, and a close parenthesis") if $n < 3;
00135   if ($n > 3) {$self->{type} = Value::Type("List",$n,$Value::Type{unknown})}
00136     else {$self->{type} = $self->{params}[1]->typeRef}
00137 }
00138 
00139 sub TeX {
00140   my $self = shift; my @params = @{$self->{params}};
00141   my $open = shift(@params); my $close = pop(@params);
00142   $open = $open->{isQuoted}? $open->{value}: $open->string;
00143   $close = $close->{isQuoted}? $close->{value}: $close->string;
00144   $open = "." unless $open; $close = "." unless $close;
00145   $open = '\{' if $open eq '{'; $close = '\}' if $close eq '}';
00146   foreach my $p (@params) {$p = $p->TeX}
00147   return '\left'.$open." ".join(',',@params).'\right'.$close." ";
00148 }

00152 package Typeset::Function::Cases;
00153 @ISA = qw(Typeset::Function);
00154 
00155 sub _check {
00156   my $self = shift;
00157   $self->{formulas} = []; $self->{conditions} = [];
00158   $self->Error("There must be at least one argument for '%s'",$self->{name})
00159     unless scalar(@{$self->{params}}) > 0;
00160   foreach my $p (@{$self->{params}}) {
00161     if ($p->type eq 'List' && $p->length == 2) {
00162       push(@{$self->{formulas}},$p->{coords}[0]);
00163       push(@{$self->{conditions}},$p->{coords}[1]);
00164     } elsif ($p->class eq 'BOP' && $p->{bop} eq '->') {
00165       push(@{$self->{formulas}},$p->{rop});
00166       push(@{$self->{conditions}},$p->{lop});
00167     } elsif ($p->class eq 'BOP' && $p->{bop} eq 'if ') {
00168       push(@{$self->{formulas}},$p->{lop});
00169       my $if = $self->{equation}{context}{parser}{UOP}->new($self->{equation},'_if_',$p->{rop});
00170       push(@{$self->{conditions}},$if);
00171     } elsif ($p->class eq 'UOP' && $p->{uop} eq 'otherwise') {
00172       push(@{$self->{formulas}},$p->{op});
00173       my $otherwise = $self->{equation}{context}{parser}{String}->new($self->{equation},'"otherwise"');
00174       push(@{$self->{conditions}},$otherwise);
00175     } else {
00176       $self->Error("The arguments for '%s' must be function-condition pairs",$self->{name});
00177     }
00178   }
00179   my $type = $self->{formulas}[0]->typeRef;
00180   foreach my $f (@{$self->{formulas}}) {
00181     $self->Error("The formulas for '%s' must all be of the same type",$self->{name})
00182       unless Parser::Item::typeMatch($type,$f->typeRef);
00183   }
00184   $self->{type} = $type;
00185 }
00186 
00187 sub TeX {
00188   my $self = shift; my @rows = ();
00189   my @f = @{$self->{formulas}}; my @c = @{$self->{conditions}};
00190   foreach my $i (0..$#f) {push(@rows,$f[$i]->TeX.'&'.$c[$i]->TeX."\\\\ ")}
00191   return '\begin{cases}'.join('',@rows).'\end{cases}';
00192 }

00196 package Typeset::Function::Array;
00197 @ISA = qw(Typeset::Function);
00198 
00199 sub _check {
00200   my $self = shift;
00201   my $equation = $self->{equation}; my $context = $equation->{context};
00202   my $template; my $param = $self->{params}[0];
00203   $self->Error("Array requires a list of entries") unless defined $param;
00204   if ($param && $param->class eq 'QuotedString') {
00205     $template = shift(@{$self->{params}})->{value};
00206   }
00207   if (scalar(@{$self->{params}}) == 1 && $self->{params}[0]->type eq 'Matrix') {
00208     $self->{M} = $self->{params}[0];
00209   } else {
00210     my $null = $context->{parser}{Constant}->new($equation,"Null");
00211     my @rows = @{$self->{params}};
00212     @rows = @{$rows[0]->{coords}} if scalar(@rows) == 1 && $rows[0]->class eq 'List';
00213     my $c = 0; foreach my $r (@rows) {$c = $r->length if $r->length > $c}
00214     if ($c == 1 && scalar(@rows) > 1) {
00215       $c = scalar(@rows);
00216       @rows = ($context->{parser}{List}->new($equation,[@rows],0,$context->{parens}{start}));
00217     }
00218     foreach my $r (@rows) {
00219       $r = ($r->class eq 'List'? $r->{coords} : [$r]);
00220       while (scalar(@{$r}) < $c) {push(@{$r},$null)};
00221       $r = bless
00222         $context->{parser}{List}->new($equation,$r,0,$context->{parens}{start},$Value::Type{number},'[',']'),
00223         $context->{lists}{Matrix}{class};
00224     }
00225     $self->{M} = bless
00226         $context->{parser}{List}->new($equation,\@rows,0,$context->{parens}{start},$rows[0]->typeRef),
00227         $context->{lists}{Matrix}{class};
00228   }
00229   $self->{M}{open} = $self->{M}{close} = '';
00230   $self->{M}{array_template} = $template;
00231   $self->{type} = $self->{M}->typeRef;
00232 }
00233 
00234 sub TeX {my $self = shift; $self->{M}->TeX}

00238 package Typeset::Function::bigOp;
00239 @ISA = qw(Typeset::Function);
00240 
00241 sub _check {
00242   my $self = shift; my $name = $self->{name};
00243   my @params = @{$self->{params}}; my $allowMax = !$self->{def}{noMax};
00244   ## check for (x;fn),  (m,M; fn),  (x:m,M; fn),  (x,m,M; fn),  (x->m; fn)
00245   if (scalar(@params) == 2) {
00246     $self->{op} = $params[1]; my $lop = $params[0];
00247     if ($lop->type eq 'List') {
00248       if ($lop->length == 2 && $allowMax) {
00249     $self->{min} = $lop->{coords}[0];
00250     $self->{max} = $lop->{coords}[1];
00251       } elsif ($lop->length == 3 && $lop->{coords}[0]->class eq 'Variable' && $allowMax) {
00252     $self->{var} = $lop->{coords}[0];
00253     $self->{min} = $lop->{coords}[1];
00254     $self->{max} = $lop->{coords}[2];
00255       } else {
00256     $self->{min} = $lop;
00257       }
00258     } elsif ($lop->class eq 'Variable') {
00259       $self->{var} = $lop;
00260     } elsif ($lop->class eq 'BOP' && $lop->{bop} eq ':') {
00261       if ($lop->{lop}->class eq 'Variable') {
00262     $self->{var} = $lop->{lop};
00263     if ($lop->{rop}->class eq 'List' && $lop->{rop}->length == 2 && $allowMax) {
00264       $self->{min} = $lop->{rop}{coords}[0];
00265       $self->{max} = $lop->{rop}{coords}[1];
00266     } else {$self->{min} = $lop->{rop}}
00267       } else {$self->{min} = $lop}
00268     } elsif ($lop->class eq 'BOP' && $lop->{bop} eq '->') {
00269       if ($lop->{lop}->class eq 'Variable' && $self->{def}{allowArrow}) {
00270     $self->{var} = $lop->{lop};
00271     $self->{min} = $lop->{rop};
00272       } else {$self->{min} = $lop}
00273     } else {$self->{min} = $lop}
00274   } elsif (scalar(@params) == 1) {
00275     $self->{op} = $params[0];
00276   } else {
00277     $self->Error("Function '%s' has too many inputs",$name) if scalar(@params) > 2;
00278     $self->Error("Function '%s' requires a formula as input",$name) unless scalar(@params) < 1;
00279   }
00280   if (!$self->{var}) {
00281     my $variable = $self->{equation}{context}{parser}{Variable};
00282     my @vars = keys %{$self->{op}->getVariables};
00283     if (scalar(@vars) == 1) {
00284       $self->{var} = $variable->new($self->{equation},$vars[0]);
00285       $self->{implicitVar} = 1;
00286     }
00287   }
00288   $self->{type} = $self->{op}->typeRef;
00289 }
00290 
00291 sub TeX {
00292   my ($self,$precedence,$showparens,$position) = @_;
00293   my $fn = $self->{def}; my $x = $self->{var};
00294   my $min = $self->{min}; my $max = $self->{max};
00295   $min = $min->TeX if defined $min;
00296   $max = $max->TeX if defined $max;
00297   $min = (defined($min)? $x->TeX.($fn->{allowArrow} ? '\to ' : '=').$min : $x->TeX)
00298     if defined $x && !$fn->{dx};
00299   my $TeX = $fn->{TeX}.(defined($min)? "_{$min}": "").
00300                        (defined($max)? "^{$max}": "")." ".$self->{op}->TeX;
00301   $TeX .= '\,d'.$x->TeX if defined $x && $fn->{dx};
00302   if (defined($precedence) and $precedence > $fn->{precedence})
00303     {$TeX = '\left('.$TeX.'\right)'} else {$TeX = "{$TeX}"}
00304   return $TeX;
00305 }
00306 
00307 sub string {
00308   my ($self,$precedence,$showparens,$position,$outerRight,$power) = @_;
00309   my $fn = $self->{equation}{context}{operators}{'fn'};
00310   my $fn_precedence = $fn->{precedence};
00311   $fn_precedence = $fn->{parenPrecedence}
00312     if ($position && $position eq 'right' && $fn->{parenPrecedence});
00313   $fn = $self->{def}; my $x = $self->{var};
00314   my $min = $self->{min}; my $max = $self->{max};
00315   $min = $min->string if defined $min;
00316   $max = $max->string if defined $max;
00317   $min = (defined($min)? $x->string.($fn->{allowArrow}? "->": ":").$min : $x->string)
00318     if defined $x && !$self->{implicitVar};
00319   my $string = (defined($min)? $min: "").(defined($max)? ",$max": "");
00320   $string .= ";" if $string ne "";
00321   $string = $self->{name}.'('.$string.$self->{op}->string.')';
00322   $string = $self->addParens($string) if (defined($precedence) and $precedence > $fn_precedence);
00323   return $string;
00324 }

00360   my $self = shift; my ($ltype,$rtype) = @_;
00361   return $self->SUPER::matchError(@_)
00362     unless $ltype->{name} =~ m/Number|Set/ && $rtype->{name} =~ m/Number|Set/;
00363   $self->{type} = Value::Type('Set',1);

00375 package Typeset::BOP::divide;
00376 @ISA = qw(Parser::BOP::divide);
00377 
00378 sub TeX {
00379   my $self = shift;
00380   my ($precedence,$showparens,$position,$outerRight) = @_;
00381   my $TeX; my $bop = $self->{def};
00382   return $self->SUPER::TeX(@_) if $self->{def}{noFrac};
00383   $showparens = '' unless defined($showparens);
00384   my $addparens =
00385       defined($precedence) &&
00386       ($showparens eq 'all' || ($precedence > $bop->{precedence} && $showparens ne 'nofractions') ||
00387       ($precedence == $bop->{precedence} &&
00388         ($bop->{associativity} eq 'right' || $showparens eq 'same')));
00389 
00390   $self->{lop}{showParens} = $self->{rop}{showParens} = 0;
00391   $TeX = '\frac{'.($self->{lop}->TeX).'}{'.($self->{rop}->TeX).'}';
00392   $self->{lop}{showParens} = $self->{rop}{showParens} = 1;
00393 
00394   $TeX = '\left('.$TeX.'\right)' if $addparens;
00395   return $TeX;
00396 }

00404 sub TeX {

00407   $rop->{open} = $rop->{close} = "" if $rop->{isSetType} || $rop->{isListType};
00408   my $tex = Parser::BOP::underscore::TeX($self,@_);
00409   $rop->{open} = $open; $rop->{close} = $close;
00410   return $tex;

00450 package Typeset::BOP::semicolon;
00451 @ISA = qw(Typeset::BOP);
00452 
00453 sub _check {
00454   my $self = shift;
00455   my ($ltype,$rtype) = ($self->{lop}->typeRef,$self->{rop}->typeRef);
00456   my $type = Value::Type('Comma',2,$Value::Type{unknown});
00457   if ($ltype->{name} eq 'Comma' && $self->{lop}{isSemicolon}) {
00458     $type->{length} += $self->{lop}->length - 1;
00459     $ltype = $self->{lop}->entryType;
00460   }
00461   $type->{entryType} = $ltype if (Parser::Item::typeMatch($ltype,$rtype));
00462   $self->{type} = $type;
00463   $self->{isSemicolon} = 1;
00464 }
00465 
00466 sub _eval {($_[1],$_[2])}
00467 
00468 sub makeList {
00469   my $self = shift;
00470   return $self unless $self->{isSemicolon};
00471   my ($lop,$rop) = ($self->{lop},$self->{rop});
00472   my $equation = $self->{equation}; my $context = $equation->{context};
00473   $lop = $context->{parser}{List}->
00474     new($equation,[$lop->makeList],$lop->{isConstant},$context->{parens}{start},$lop->entryType,'(',')')
00475       if $lop->{def}{isComma} && !$lop->{isSemicolon};
00476   $rop = $context->{parser}{List}->
00477     new($equation,[$rop->makeList],$dop->{isConstant},$context->{parens}{start},$rop->entryType,'(',')')
00478       if $rop->{def}{isComma};
00479   return (($self->{lop}{isSemicolon} ? $lop->makeList : $lop),
00480       ($self->{rop}{isSemicolon} ? $rop->makeList : $rop));
00481 }

00485 package Typeset::UOP;
00486 @ISA = qw(Parser::UOP);
00487 
00488 sub TeX {
00489   my ($self,$precedence,$showparens,$position,$outerRight) = @_;
00490   my $TeX; my $uop = $self->{def}; $position = '' unless defined($position);
00491   my $fracparens = ($uop->{nofractionparens}) ? "nofractions" : "";
00492   my $addparens = $outerRight;
00493   $TeX = (defined($uop->{TeX}) ? $uop->{TeX} : $uop->{string});
00494   if ($uop->{associativity} eq "right") {
00495     $TeX = $self->{op}->TeX($uop->{precedence},$fracparens) . $TeX;
00496   } else {
00497     $TeX = $TeX . $self->{op}->TeX($uop->{precedence},$fracparens);
00498   }
00499   $TeX = '\left('.$TeX.'\right)' if $addparens;
00500   return $TeX;
00501 }

00520 sub TeX {
00521   my ($self,$precedence) = @_;
00522   my $TeX; my $uop = $self->{def};
00523   $TeX = (defined($uop->{TeX}) ? $uop->{TeX} : $uop->{string});
00524   if ($uop->{associativity} eq "right")
00525      {$TeX = $self->{op}->TeX($uop->{precedence}) . $TeX} else
00526      {$TeX = $TeX . $self->{op}->TeX($uop->{precedence})}
00527   return $TeX;
00528 }

00553 package Typeset::UOP::prime;
00554 @ISA = qw(Typeset::UOP::TeX);
00555 
00556 sub string {
00557   my ($self,$precedence,$showparens,$position,$outerRight) = @_;
00558   my $uop = $self->{def}; $position = '' unless defined($position);
00559   my $addparens = defined($precedence) &&
00560     ($precedence > $uop->{precedence} || $position eq 'right' || $outerRight);
00561   my $string = $self->{op}->string($uop->{precedence},$fracparens) . "'";
00562   $string = '\left('.$string.'\right)' if $addparens;
00563   return $string;
00564 }
00565 
00566 sub TeX {
00567   my ($self,$precedence,$showparens,$position,$outerRight) = @_;
00568   my $uop = $self->{def}; $position = '' unless defined($position);
00569   my $addparens = defined($precedence) &&
00570     ($precedence > $uop->{precedence} || $position eq 'right' || $outerRight);
00571   my $TeX = $self->{op}->TeX($uop->{precedence},$fracparens) . "'";
00572   $TeX = '\left('.$TeX.'\right)' if $addparens;
00573   return $TeX;
00574 }
00575 
00576 ######################################################################
00577 
00578 package Typeset::UOP::root;
00579 @ISA = qw(Typeset::UOP::TeX);
00580 
00581 sub TeX {
00582   my $self = shift;
00583   return "\\root ".$self->{op}->TeX if $self->{op}->class eq 'BOP' && $self->{op}{bop} eq 'of ';
00584   return "\\root ".$self->{op}{coords}[0]->TeX." \\of {".$self->{op}{coords}[1]->TeX."}"
00585     if $self->{op}->class eq 'List' && scalar(@{$self->{op}{coords}}) == 2;
00586   return "\\sqrt{".$self->{op}->TeX."}";
00587 }
00588 
00589 package Typeset::BOP::of;
00590 @ISA = qw(Typeset::BOP::TeX);
00591 
00592 sub TeX {
00593   my $self = shift;
00594   return $self->{lop}->TeX . " \\of {" . $self->{rop}->TeX . "}";
00595 }
00596 
00597 ######################################################################
00598 
00599 package Typeset::List;
00600 @ISA = qw(Parser::List);
00601 
00602 sub _eval {
00603   my $self = shift;
00604   return $self->SUPER::_eval(@_) unless $self->type eq 'Number';
00605   $self->{coords}[0]->eval(@_);
00606 }
00607 
00608 sub new {
00609   my $self = shift;
00610   my $equation = shift; my $coords = shift;
00611   my $constant = shift; my $paren = shift;
00612   my $entryType = shift || $Value::Type{unknown};
00613   my $open = shift || ''; my $close = shift || '';
00614   my $context = $equation->{context};
00615   my $parens = $context->{parens};
00616 
00617   if ($paren && $close && $paren->{formInterval}) {
00618     $paren = $parens->{interval}
00619       if ($paren->{close} ne $close || (scalar(@{$coords}) == 2 &&
00620            ($coords->[0]->{isInfinite} || $coords->[1]->{isInfinite})));
00621   }
00622   my $type = Value::Type($paren->{type},scalar(@{$coords}),$entryType,
00623                                 list => 1, formMatrix => $paren->{formMatrix});
00624   if ($type->{name} ne 'Interval' && ($type->{name} ne 'Set' || $type->{length} != 0)) {
00625     if ($paren->{formMatrix} && $entryType->{formMatrix}) {$type->{name} = 'Matrix'}
00626     elsif ($entryType->{name} eq 'unknown') {
00627       if ($paren->{formList}) {$type->{name} = 'List'}
00628       elsif ($type->{name} eq 'Point') {
00629         $equation->Error("Entries in a Matrix must be of the same type and length")}
00630       elsif ($type->{name} ne 'Set') {
00631     $type->{name} = "Matrix" if $paren->{formMatrix};
00632     $equation->Error(["Entries in a %s must be of the same type",$type->{name}]);
00633       }
00634     }
00635   }
00636   $open = '' if $open eq 'start'; $close = '' if $close eq 'start';
00637   my $list = bless {
00638     coords => $coords, type => $type, open => $open, close => $close,
00639     paren => $paren, equation => $equation, isConstant => $constant
00640   }, $context->{lists}{$type->{name}}{class};
00641   $list->weaken;
00642 
00643   my $zero = 1;
00644   foreach my $x (@{$coords}) {$zero = 0, last unless $x->{isZero}}
00645   $list->{isZero} = 1 if $zero && scalar(@{$coords}) > 0;
00646 
00647   $list->_check;
00648 
00649 #  warn ">> $list->{type}{name} of $list->{type}{entryType}{name} of length $list->{type}{length}\n";
00650 
00651   if ($list->{isConstant} && $context->flag('reduceConstants')) {
00652     $type = $list->{type};
00653     $list = $list->Item("Value")->new($equation,[$list->eval]);
00654     $list->{type} = $type; $list->{open} = $open; $list->{close} = $close;
00655     $list->{value}->{open} = $open, $list->{value}->{close} = $close
00656       if ref($list->{value});
00657   }
00658   return $list;
00659 }
00660 
00661 ######################################################################
00662 
00663 package Typeset::List::List;
00664 @ISA = qw(Typeset::List Parser::List::List);
00665 
00666 sub _check {
00667   my $self = shift;
00668   $self->{isListType} = 1; $self->{showParens} = 1;
00669   return unless $self->length == 1;
00670   $self->{type} = {%{$self->{coords}[0]->typeRef}};
00671   $self->{type}{formMatrix} = 1 if $self->context->{parens}{$self->{open}}{formMatrix};
00672   $self->{isSingle} = 1;
00673   $self->entryType->{entryType} = $self->{coords}[0]->type if scalar(@{$self->{coords}}) == 1;
00674 }
00675 
00676 sub TeX {
00677   my $self = shift;
00678   return $self->SUPER::TeX(@_) if $self->{showParens} || $self->length != 1;
00679   return $self->{coords}[0]->TeX(@_);
00680 }
00681 
00682 ######################################################################
00683 
00684 package Typeset::List::Vector;
00685 @ISA = qw(Parser::List::List);
00686 
00687 sub TeX {
00688   my $self = shift; my $precedence = shift; my @coords = ();
00689   my $def = $self->context->{lists}{Vector};
00690   my ($open,$close) = ($def->{TeX_open},$def->{TeX_close});
00691   $open = '\{' if $open eq '{'; $close = '\}' if $close eq '}';
00692   $open  = '\left' .$open  if $open  ne '';
00693   $close = '\right'.$close if $close ne '';
00694   foreach my $x (@{$self->{coords}}) {push(@coords,$x->TeX)}
00695   return $open.join(',',@coords).$close unless $self->{ColumnVector};
00696   '\left[\begin{array}{c}'.join('\cr'."\n",@coords).'\cr\end{array}\right]';
00697 }
00698 
00699 ######################################################################
00700 
00701 package Typeset::List::Set;
00702 @ISA = qw(Typeset::List);
00703 
00704 sub _check {
00705   my $self = shift;
00706   $self->{isSetType} = 1; $self->{showParens} = 1;
00707   return unless $self->length == 1;
00708   my $x = $self->{coords}[0];
00709   if ($x->{isSetType}) {
00710     $x->{showParens} = 1;
00711     $self->{showParens} = 0;
00712   } else {
00713     if ($x->class =~ m/BOP|UOP/) {
00714       $self->{type} = $self->{coords}[0]->typeRef;
00715       $self->{showParens} = 0;
00716     }
00717   }
00718 }
00719 
00720 sub canBeInUnion {1};
00721 
00722 sub string {
00723   my $self = shift; my $precedence = shift;
00724   return $self->SUPER::string(@_) if $self->{showParens} || $self->length > 1;
00725   my $set = $self->{coords}[0];
00726   return '{ '.$set->string.' }' if $set->class eq 'BOP' && $set->{def}{formSet};
00727   return $self->{coords}[0]->string;
00728 }
00729 
00730 sub TeX {
00731   my $self = shift; my $precedence = shift;
00732   return $self->SUPER::TeX(@_) if $self->{showParens} || $self->length > 1;
00733   my $set = $self->{coords}[0];
00734   return '\left\{\,'.$set->TeX.'\,\right\}' if $set->class eq 'BOP' && $set->{def}{formSet};
00735   return $self->{coords}[0]->TeX;
00736 }
00737 
00738 ######################################################################
00739 
00740 package Typeset::List::AbsoluteValue;
00741 @ISA = qw(Parser::List::AbsoluteValue);
00742 
00743 sub TeX {
00744   my $self = shift;
00745   return $self->SUPER::TeX(@_) unless $self->{coords}[0]->type eq 'Matrix';
00746   my $M = bless {%{$self->{coords}[0]}, open => '|', close => '|'}, ref($self->{coords}[0]);
00747   $M->TeX;
00748 }

00752 package main;
00753 
00754 $context{Typeset} = $Parser::Context::Default::context{Full}->copy;
00755 $context{Typeset}->flags->set(
00756   reduceConstants => 0,
00757   reduceConstantFunctions => 0,
00758   allowMissingOperands => 1,          # turn off most error checking
00759   allowMissingFunctionInputs => 1,    #  by setting these four
00760   allowBadOperands => 1,              #  flags to 1
00761   allowBadFunctionInputs => 1,        #
00762   showExtraParens => 0,               # Try to keep the author's parens
00763 );
00764 $context{Typeset}->{_initialized} = 0;  # prevent updating of patterns until we're done
00765 
00766 sub TeXOp {
00767   my $type = shift; my $prec = shift; my $assoc = shift;
00768   my $op = shift; my $string = shift; my $tex = shift;
00769   $tex = "" unless defined $tex; $tex .= " " if substr($tex,0,1) eq "\\";
00770   my $class = 'Typeset::'.($type eq 'bin'? "BOP" : "UOP").'::TeX';
00771   return $op => {precedence => $prec, associativity => $assoc, type => $type,
00772       string => $string, TeX=>$tex, class=>$class, @_};
00773 }
00774 sub TeXUnary {my $op = shift; TeXOp("unary",1,"left",$op," $op ",@_)}
00775 sub TeXBin {my $op = shift; TeXOp("bin",.8,"left",$op," $op ",@_)}
00776 sub TeXRel {my $op = shift; TeXOp("bin",.7,"left",$op," $op ",@_)}
00777 sub TeXArrow {my $op = shift; TeXOp("bin",.7,"left",$op," $op ",@_)}
00778 
00779 $context{Typeset}->operators->add(
00780   ';' => {
00781     precedence => 0, associativity => 'left', type => 'bin', string => ';',
00782     class => 'Typeset::BOP::semicolon', isComma => 1
00783   },
00784   '_if_' => {
00785     precedence => .61, associativity => 'left', type => 'unary', string => ' if ',
00786     class => 'Typeset::UOP::_if_', hidden => 1
00787   },
00788   "'" => {
00789     precedence => 7.5, associativity => 'right', type => 'unary', string => "'",
00790     class => 'Typeset::UOP::prime'
00791   },
00792 );
00793 
00794 $context{Typeset}->operators->set(
00795   ',' => {precedence=>.5},
00796   '_' => {class=>'Typeset::BOP::underscore',associativity=>"right"},
00797   ' ' => {string => 'space'},
00798   'space' => {precedence => 3, associativity => 'left', type => 'bin',
00799           string => '', TeX => '', class => 'Parser::BOP::multiply', hidden => 1},
00800   '/'  => {class => 'Typeset::BOP::divide'},
00801   '/ ' => {class => 'Typeset::BOP::divide'},
00802   ' /' => {class => 'Typeset::BOP::divide'},
00803   '^'  => {class => 'Typeset::BOP::power'},
00804   '**' => {class => 'Typeset::BOP::power'},
00805   '-'  => {class => 'Typeset::BOP::subtract'},
00806   'U'  => {class => 'Typeset::BOP::union'},
00807 );
00808 
00809 $context{Typeset}->operators->redefine('&', using => ",", from=>$context{Typeset});
00810 $context{Typeset}->operators->redefine("\\\\", using => ";", from => $context{Typeset});
00811 $context{Typeset}->operators->redefine("cross", using => "><", from => $context{Typeset});
00812

00954 
00955 sub TeXGreek {
00956   my $greek = shift; my $uc = shift;
00957   push(@_,TeX=>"{\\rm $uc}") if $uc;
00958   return ($greek => {value => Real(1), TeX=>"\\$greek ", keepName=>1, @_});
00959 }
00960 
00961 sub TeXord {
00962   my $name = shift; my $tex = shift;
00963   $tex = "\\$name " unless defined $tex; $tex .= ' ' if $tex =~ m/\\[a-zA-Z]+$/;
00964   return ($name => {value => Real(1), TeX=>$tex, keepName=>1, @_});
00965 }
00966 
00967 sub TeXconst {
00968   my $name = shift; my $tex = shift; $tex .= " " unless $tex =~ m/}$/;
00969   my $string = shift; $string = $name unless defined $string;
00970   return ($name => {value => Real(1), TeX=>$tex, string=>$string, keepName=>1, @_});
00971 }
00972

01040 # TeXord('iiint','\iiint'),
01041   TeXord('oint','\oint'),
01042   TeXord('bigcup','\bigcup'),
01043   TeXord('bigcap','\bigcap'),
01044   TeXord('bigsqcup','\bigsqcup'),
01045   TeXord('bigvee','\bigvee'),
01046   TeXord('bigwedge','\bigwedge'),
01047   TeXord('bigodot','\bigodot'),
01048   TeXord('bigotimes','\bigotimes'),
01049   TeXord('bigoplus','\bigoplus'),
01050   TeXord('biguplus','\biguplus'),
01051 );
01052 $context{Typeset}->constants->add(_blank_ => {value => Real(0), hidden => 1, string => "", TeX => ""});
01053 
01054 ######################################################################
01055 
01056 sub TeXBigOp {
01057   my $name = shift; my $tex = shift;
01058   return ($name => {class => 'Typeset::Function::bigOp', precedence => .9, TeX => $tex, @_});
01059 }
01060 
01061 sub TeXfn {
01062   my $name = shift;
01063   return ($name => {class => 'Typeset::Function::'.$name, @_});
01064 }
01065 
01066 sub TeXnamedFn {
01067   my $name = shift;
01068   return ($name => {class => 'Typeset::Function::named', TeX=>"\\$name", @_});
01069 }
01070 
01071 sub TeXaccent {
01072   my $name = shift;
01073   return ($name => {class => 'Typeset::Function::accent', TeX=>"\\$name", @_});
01074 }
01075 
01076 sub TeXoverunder {
01077   my $name = shift;
01078   return ($name => {class => 'Typeset::Function::overunder', TeX=>"\\$name", @_});
01079 }
01080

01137 $context{Typeset}->parens->set(
01138   '(' => {type => 'List', removable => 0, formMatrix => 0},
01139   '[' => {type => 'List', removable => 0},
01140   '{' => {type => "Set",  removable => 0, emptyOK=>1},
01141 );
01142 $context{Typeset}->parens->add(
01143   '<[' => {type => "Vector", close => ']>'},
01144 );
01145 $context{Typeset}->parens->remove('<');
01146 
01147 $context{Typeset}->lists->set(
01148   Set    => {class => 'Typeset::List::Set'},
01149   List   => {class => 'Typeset::List::List'},
01150   Vector => {class => 'Typeset::List::Vector', TeX_open => "<", TeX_close => ">"},
01151   AbsoluteValue => {class => 'Typeset::List::AbsoluteValue'},
01152 );
01153 $context{Typeset}->{parser}{List} = 'Typeset::List';

01168 $context{Typeset}->strings->set(infty => {string => "infty"});
